targets.expr:
rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!~"POD|" }[1m])
* on (pod) group_left(created_by_kind, created_by_name) kube_pod_info{created_by_kind=~"$workload_type", created_by_name=~"$workload_name"}

panels.description: Only containers with resource limits set are displayed.

targets.expr:
rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod" }[1m]) / on (container, pod) kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"}
* on (pod) group_left(created_by_kind, created_by_name, namespace) kube_pod_info{created_by_kind=~"$workload_type", created_by_name=~"$workload_name"}

panels.title: 컨테이너 CPU request 대비 사용률 (%)

targets.expr:
increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace=~"$namespace", container!="", pod=~"$pod"}[1m] ) /  increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace=~"$namespace", container!="", pod=~"$pod"}[1m] )
* on (pod) group_left(created_by_kind, created_by_name) kube_pod_info{created_by_kind=~"$workload_type", created_by_name=~"$workload_name"}

increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace=~"$namespace", container!="", pod=~"$pod"}[1m] ) /  increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace=~"$namespace", container!="", pod=~"$pod"}[1m] )
* on (pod) group_left(created_by_kind, created_by_name) kube_pod_info{created_by_kind=~"$workload_type", created_by_name=~"$workload_name"}

container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", container!~"POD|", pod=~"$pod"}
* on (pod) group_left(created_by_kind, created_by_name) kube_pod_info{created_by_kind=~"$workload_type", created_by_name=~"$workload_name"}

panels.description: Only containers with resource limits set are displayed.

targets.expr:
container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace",container!~"POD|", pod=~"$pod" } / on (container, pod) group_left(created_by_kind, created_by_name, namespace) kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory"}
* on (pod) group_left(created_by_kind, created_by_name, namespace) kube_pod_info{created_by_kind=~"$workload_type", created_by_name=~"$workload_name"}

panels.title: 컨테이너 Memory request 대비 사용률 (%)

targets.expr:
sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{ namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", interface=~"et.+"}[5m])) by(pod)
* on (pod) group_left(created_by_kind, created_by_name, namespace) kube_pod_info{created_by_kind=~"$workload_type", created_by_name=~"$workload_name"}

sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{ namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", interface=~"et.+"}[5m])) by(pod)
* on (pod) group_left(created_by_kind, created_by_name, namespace) kube_pod_info{created_by_kind=~"$workload_type", created_by_name=~"$workload_name"}

sum(rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{device=~"/dev/.*", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="", pod=~"$pod"}[5m]))by(pod)
* on (pod) group_left(created_by_kind, created_by_name, namespace) kube_pod_info{created_by_kind=~"$workload_type", created_by_name=~"$workload_name"}

sum(rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{device=~"/dev/.*", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by(pod)
* on (pod) group_left(created_by_kind, created_by_name, namespace) kube_pod_info{created_by_kind=~"$workload_type", created_by_name=~"$workload_name"}
